Title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Writer: Jonathan Aibel (screenplay by), Glenn Berger (screenplay by), Stephen Hillenburg (story by), Paul Tibbitt (story by), Stephen Hillenburg (based on: the series "SpongeBob SquarePants", created by), Vincent Waller (creative supervision)
Actors: Antonio Banderas, Eric Bauza, Tim Conway, Eddie Deezen
Plot: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.
